ygData.subject: Re: petition for a better wizard
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree.  Add me too! - Ziffnab of Xegony ... _________________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Get your free @yahoo.com address at
ygData.messageBody:
I agree. Add me too!

- Ziffnab of Xegony
--- Ken Lee <kenlee@...> wrote:
> From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
> WONDERFUL and WELL DONE !
>
> Add my character name to the list on the petition.
>
> Zalbar
> 20th Wizard
> Solusek Ro
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: 27 mai, 1999 17:24
> Subject: [eq_wizards] petition for a better wizard
>
>
> >From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
> >
> >Okay,
> >
> >I spent the last 1/2 hour rewriting the petition.
> Hopefully this will
> >get us closer to bring this to a conclusion. I
> left the majority of the
> >spells out only because I really feel that we as a
> group will never come
> >to an agreement on them.
> >
> >Malkin
> >
> >-----Start Letter-----
> >
> >Dear EverQuest Staff,
> >
> >We are a large group of wizards who have come
> together through a mailing
> >list. Through much discussion and debate, we have
> agreed to send you
> >this feedback concerning improvements to the
> wizard. We would like to
> >thank you in advance for your careful consideration
> of these
> >modifications.
> >
> >1) Spells are 100% resisted by mobs 6+ levels above
> the caster. In large
> >groups hunting big prey this level cap turns a
> wizard from the main
> >dealer of damage to a useless member in the group.
> Our suggestion is
> >that either the cap be raised to 6+ levels of the
> highest member in the
> >group, or the cap be raised to 8+ levels higher
> than the caster.
> >
> >2) Spells that both stun and damage targets are
> often resisted by mobs
> >that /con green and blue. If this is the result of
> the stun effect, we
> >would like one spell without this effect at the
> same level.
> >
> >3) Many spell suggestions have crossed this list.
> Here is one that we
> >all feel would be a great addition.
> >
> >Tap Affinity - Teleport targeted group member to
> their own bind spot
> >
> >4) O'Kiels Radiation seems that it would be the
> beginning of a great
> >line of spells. Why should it end there? Cold and
> Magic based
> >buffs/shields would be a very welcome addition.
> >
> >5) Wizards seem to be very neglected when it comes
> to carrying or
> >wearing items that enhance our appearance. Also,
> many completely
> >different spells have the same visual effects.
> >
> >
> >We would like to thank you again for your time. Any
> type of feedback
> >would be greatly appriciated.
> >
> >
> >Sincerely,
> >
> >The Wizards of Norrath
> >eq_wizards@onelist.com
> >
> >
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >What was YOUR favorite part?!
> >http://www.onelist.com
> >Tell other Star Wars fans at ONElist!
> >
>
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------

> of the Week.

> changing YOUR life!
